```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
```

## Problem 1

### Dataframe contains file names
```{r problem 1.1}
zip_file = tibble(file_name = list.files("./data"))
zip_file
```

### Read data
```{r problem 1.2, message = F}
read_file = function(x){
  
  x = str_c("./data/", x)
  read_csv(x)
  
}

zip_file = 
  zip_file %>%
  mutate(data = map(zip_file$file_name, read_file))
```

### Tidy data
```{r problem 1.3}
tidy_zip_file = 
  unnest(zip_file) %>%
  separate(file_name, into =c("arm", "id"), sep = "_") %>%
  separate(id, into =c("id", "other"), sep = ".csv") %>%
  gather(key = week, value = observation, week_1:week_8) %>%
  separate(week, into = c("rm", "week"), sep = "_") %>%
  select(-other, -rm )
```
